channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Atlas
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Atlas

item.title: CVE-2017-3153|2024-09-16T18:24:06.592Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20atlas
item.description: Apache Atlas versions 0.6.0-incubating and 0.7.0-incubating were found vulnerable to Reflected XSS in the search functionality.

item.title: CVE-2016-8752|2024-09-16T19:05:02.136Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20atlas
item.description: Apache Atlas versions 0.6.0 (incubating), 0.7.0 (incubating), and 0.7.1 (incubating) allow access to the webapp directory contents by pointing to URIs like /js and /img.

item.title: CVE-2017-3150|2024-09-16T19:57:05.348Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20atlas
item.description: Apache Atlas versions 0.6.0-incubating and 0.7.0-incubating use cookies that could be accessible to client-side script.

item.title: CVE-2017-3155|2024-09-16T19:36:18.696Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20atlas
item.description: Apache Atlas versions 0.6.0-incubating and 0.7.0-incubating were found vulnerable to cross frame scripting.
